_meanings:
A prefix to verbs and
nouns. <ls>G. M.</ls> gives the following
senses with illustrations:--

{@--11@} Power;
{#utsAhaH; ut#} 
{#prAbalyaviyogorDvakarmalABaprakASAScaryamokzaRABAvadalaprADAnyaSAktizu#}. With
nouns it forms adj. and <ab>adv.</ab> 
compounds; {#udarcis, ucCiKa, udbAhu, unnidraM#},
{#utpaTaM, uddAmaM#} &c. It is sometimes
used in the Veda as an expletive
simply to fill out the verse.
